body:
@rehandalal Any thoughts on how the API should consume the various filter params? I'm currently stubbing out code that hits this endpoint: `/api/v1/recipe/?status=disabled&channel=release,aurora&locale=en-uk` - how does that look to you?

edit:

for text filters, I'm `encodeURIComponent`ing the text, like so: `status=enabled&channel=release,nightly&text=test%20string%20one,test%20string%20two`.

This example uses two test strings (`test string one` and `test string two`), but I think @mythmon mentioned not allowing multiple text filters at a time. Either works for me - I have the code set up to work both ways - I think it comes down to @rehandalal and if it's difficult/worth the work on the backend.
